channel.title: Character local database link
channel.description:
hi
idk if the name of this topic is right, but what i mean is
IS THERE A LINK INSIDE THE SOURCE AS:
Example:
Load characters of players at: source/data/characters
i need to change that because i have 2 worlds and i like to run both of the worlds on 1 character database, so everyone keep their items if they switch from world.
zerk p0wer
